contents.name: DeviceId
contents.comment: Represents the unique ID of the Tributech-SSM-device.

contents.name: PublicKey
contents.comment: Represents the current public-key of the device which matches with the current key-pair generated inside the Optiga Trust M chip.

contents.name: MaxMerkleTreeDepth
contents.comment: Represents the max merkle tree depth setting

contents.name: MaxMerkleTreeAge
contents.comment: Represents the max merkle tree age setting

contents.name: Sources
contents.description: Contains all sources of the given agent.

contents.name: OPCUA_Sources
contents.description: Contains all sources of the given agent.
